name: Domain Concepts
title: Domain Concepts
body:

Entities and their connetions

note

This is not a complete list but an extract.

This is not a complete list but an extract.

External Identity Provider

Tenant:

A tenant is the highest grouping or separation mechanism. A tenant is usually connected to a set of policies, contains all the users of this tenant and has a specific set of applications that belong to that tenant.

User:

A user contains basic information to login. It is always part of a tenant. In case of the panelist it could happen that a user is part of multiple tenants. …..

Application:

… Policy:
